alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued December 15 at 6:45PM EST until December 19 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM FRIDAY TO 1 PM EST MONDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total lake effect snow accumulations of 15 to 22 inches in the most persistent lake snows. * WHERE...Chautauqua and Southern Erie counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM Friday to 1 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times with very slippery roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4281 7818 4296 7816 4302 7827 4297 7898 4286 7889 4276 7900 4245 7952 4245 7919 4251 7889 4270 7831 TIME Y22M12D17T0000Z-Y22M12D17T1800Z COORD...4299 7815 4308 7817 4311 7831 4303 7865 4297 7893 4281 7890 4255 7936 4252 7933 4271 7876 4279 7842 TIME Y22M12D17T1800Z-Y22M12D18T0600Z COORD...4268 7817 4290 7814 4298 7830 4294 7884 4279 7890 4232 7975 4217 7977 4230 7931 4240 7873 4253 7841 TIME Y22M12D18T0600Z-Y22M12D18T1800Z COORD...4262 7820 4275 7819 4277 7861 4264 7919 4234 7970 4210 7975 4205 7964 4217 7900 4215 7883 4233 7844 TIME Y22M12D18T1800Z-Y22M12D19T1800Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
